 2017-01152017-02-13,  NRCAN,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Ballast Water Control and Management Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the BALLAST WATER CONTROL AND MANAGEMENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; and (2) correct typographical or grammatical errors, identified by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0020 Publication Date: 2017-02-22
